title: Amanda Seyfried's tally for 2025: 3 starring roles, 2 Golden Globe nominations
summary: Amanda Seyfried is up for a Golden Globe for her performance in The Testament of Ann Lee, a movie musical about the leader of the Shakers, the 18th-century religious movement that preached celibacy, gender and racial equality, and pacifism.
contentText:
Amanda Seyfried is up for a Golden Globe for her performance in The Testament of Ann Lee , a movie musical about the leader of the Shakers, the 18th-century religious movement that preached celibacy, gender and racial equality, and pacifism.

(Image credit: Searchlight Pictures/Searchlight Pictures)
